name: SE2-08 — THE HIDDEN PATH OF MAJOR
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Anse Major Trail (Bel Ombre, Mahé). A path with teeth and sea below.
Count the cuts; they bite the heading east.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.clue:
A path with teeth and sea below.
Count the cuts; they bite the heading east.
properties.visual_description: Cliffside path; granite teeth; distant ship under cloud break; map scrap pinned by dagger to stump.
